about.experience: I became interested in programming in 2011, still in college. I started as a web publisher in a large corporation, later in several smaller companies as a Web Developer.
about.experience1: I worked on both business applications based on the Zend, Symfony and Laravel frameworks, and I did static pages based on CMS Wordpress in cooperation with graphics.
about.experience2: From 4 years on B2B, and from 3 as Front-end Developer.
about.experience3: After the initial adventures with jQuery and AngularJS, I focused on working with the ReactJS framework - or else; I am at the stage of fascination with this tool
about.codingIsFun: Programming is not only a job for me, but also great fun! After starting the adventure with React, I think that geography can be really nice.
about.interestedIn: In my free time I devote myself to a different passion - photography, I also like football very much, which I have been playing regularly for over 20 years :)
